name: Jump, Bounce, Win!
description:
Jump, Bounce, Win! is a causal party game.

How to Play

Jump and bounce on your opponents to gain height. Goal is to be higher than your competitors at end of round. When the round timer hits 0, everyone freezes and their heights are measured. The highest competitor wins the round. After all the rounds are complete, the competitor with most wins is declared the CHAMPION.

Controls

WASD - Move

SPACE - Jump

ENTER - Reset Game (after all rounds are complete)

Developer Notes

Currently, this prototype is single player with a basic AI competitors. I would like this to be 2-4 players, different fun party modes, and better AI.

I would love to hear you thoughts and feedback about the game concept.
